title: There are still 'so many' Asian stories yet to be told, entertainment advocate says
description: Michelle Sugihara is the executive director at the Coalition of Asian Pacifics in Entertainment (CAPE)  and has long been a champion for Asian representation both on and off the screen. As part of our arts and culture series, CANVAS, Sugihara  shares her "brief but spectacular" take on changing the world through stories. PBS NewsHour is supported by - https://www.pbs.org/newshour/about/funders
